name: Agents
description: Discover the unique abilities, personalities, and roles of every Agent in Valorant. Master their strengths and pick your perfect operative for battle.

name: Maps
description: Explore the iconic maps of Valorant, each with its own layout, lore, and tactical challenges. Learn the best spots, callouts, and strategies.

name: Weapons
description: Dive into the arsenal of Valorant, from deadly rifles to precise pistols. Compare stats and find the perfect weapon to match your playstyle.

name: Gamemodes
description: From competitive ranked to fun casual modes, discover everything Valorant has to offer in gameplay variety. Which mode suits you best?

name: Player cards
description: Show off your personality with stylish player cards. Browse through the full collection and learn how to unlock your favorites.

name: Competitive Tiers
description: Climb the ranks and prove your skills. Understand Valorantâ€™s competitive tiers, from Iron to Radiant, and what it takes to rise.

name: Sprays
description: Add flair to your frags with expressive sprays. View every spray in the game and learn which ones are the most sought-after.

name: Bundles
description: Stay up to date with the latest skin bundles and themed collections in Valorant. Discover pricing, release dates, and exclusive cosmetics.
